__e: If not love children, why did you steal?
When I do anything on my own you tell why did you do like this?
Look, when you feel cornered you revert back to your old thought patterns.
Well, if you know that, then why don't you try it sometime?
Look, why don't we discuss this tonight at my place at the beach?
All right, so how about we run it?
No, I don't. Why don't you tell me?
All right, then why don't you tell me what I have to do?
well, then, Tony, why don't you tell me what it is you really want?
Whatever it is you did for him, why can't you do it for me?
- Since you ask, why don't we go away for the weekend like we used to?
You know, while you've been off doing God knows what, I've actually been here, working, so why don't you just let me say what I need to say?
I don't know. Why do you care so much?
Then why do you go to him?
Okay.why am I even talking to you about love
Uh, I mean, why do you summon me, my Lord King?
Yeah. If you're such an expert, why'd you ask for my help?
Okay, so, why are you telling me?
So question-- why are you here?
Speaking of which, why are you here?
I meant, why are we here?
And why are you home so early?
No... there always has to be a right way with you and a wrong way with you.
The bus isn't moving, then why are you running after it?
Incidentally, I've always wondered why you settled in our country in the year...
Mom, why did my other brother go away?
She asked why he must marry them.
